MetaRC:SubcaseOfSameFrame

From EN MetaNet Wiki
Jump to: navigation, search
MetaRCGroup SubcaseOfSameFrame
MetaRCDescription Target frame and source frame are subcases of the the same frame, with up to 2 subcase relations cascaded.
MetaRCComments
MetaRCScore -0.5
MetaRCQueryCode mo:isSubcaseOfFrame/mo:isSubcaseOfFrame) ?tframe .
    ?otherframe (mo:isSubcaseOfFrame|mo:isSubcaseOfFrame/mo:isSubcaseOfFrame) ?sframe .
    ?otherframe mo:hasName ?othername .
}
Retrieved from "http://ambrosia2.sys.icsi.berkeley.edu/dev/en/index.php?title=MetaRC:SubcaseOfSameFrame&oldid=1549"
Category:
  • MetaRC
Facts about "SubcaseOfSameFrame"
RDF feed
Has MetaRC groupSubcaseOfSameFrame +
Has MetaRC query
SELECT ?tframe ?sframe ?otherframe ?othername WHERE {
    ?otherframe (mo:isSubcaseOfFrame|mo:isSubcaseOfFrame/mo:isSubcaseOfFrame) ?tframe .
    ?otherframe (mo:isSubcaseOfFrame|mo:isSubcaseOfFrame/mo:isSubcaseOfFrame) ?sframe .
    ?otherframe mo:hasName ?othername .
}
Has MetaRC score-0.5 +
Has descriptionTarget frame and source frame are subcases of the the same frame, with up to 2 subcase relations cascaded. +
